findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdraw(uint256) (reentrance.sol#21-29):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_amount)() (reentrance.sol#24)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (reentrance.sol#27)
	Reentrance.balances (reentrance.sol#11) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Reentrance.balanceOf(address) (reentrance.sol#17-19)
	- Reentrance.balances (reentrance.sol#11)
	- Reentrance.donate(address) (reentrance.sol#13-15)
	- Reentrance.withdraw(uint256) (reentrance.sol#21-29)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.18 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.18 (reentrance.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrance.withdraw(uint256) (reentrance.sol#21-29):
	- msg.sender.call.value(_amount)() (reentrance.sol#24)
findings.name: low-level-calls

findings.message: Parameter Reentrance.balanceOf(address)._who (reentrance.sol#17) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message: Parameter Reentrance.withdraw(uint256)._amount (reentrance.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message: Parameter Reentrance.donate(address)._to (reentrance.sol#13) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention
